meanings.definition: Not arranged in a particular order or pattern.
meanings.sent1: The toys in the box were unarrayed, scattered all around.
meanings.sent2: Her unarrayed hair flowed freely in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The unarrayed puzzle pieces seemed to play hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The unarrayed thoughts in his mind felt like a jumbled mess.
meanings.sent5: The unarrayed garden looked wild and untamed.

meanings.definition: Not dressed or adorned in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: The mannequin displayed the unarrayed dress without any accessories.
meanings.sent2: She felt comfortable in her unarrayed pajamas.
meanings.sent3: The unarrayed scarecrow looked quite plain in the field.
meanings.sent4: Her unarrayed appearance made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The unarrayed room lacked any decoration or color.
